actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the use of Federal funds for the transportation of public school children without the written consent of their parents.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Neighborhood School Act - Prohibits the use of Federal funds for: (1) the transportation of public school children because of race, color, national origin, creed, or sex without the voluntary consent of their parents, or (2) requiring or encouraging the assignment of teachers to any particular public school except by voluntary consent.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the use of Federal funds for the transportation of public school children without the written consent of their parents.
